scripts.build: echo '🚀 Starting build process...' && npm run clean && echo '✅ Clean completed' && npm run build:sre-next && echo '✅ SRE NEXT completed' && npm run build:index && echo '✅ Index completed'
scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning dist directory...' && rm -rf dist && echo '✅ Dist directory removed'
scripts.build:sre-next: echo '📊 Building SRE NEXT presentation...' && npx slidev build SRE-NEXT-2025/slides.md --out dist/sre-next-2025 --base /sre-next-2025/ && echo '✅ SRE NEXT build completed'
scripts.build:slidev-system: echo '⚙️ Building Slidev System presentation...' && npx slidev build SLIDEV-SYSTEM/slides.md --out dist/slidev-system --base /slidev-system/ && echo '✅ Slidev System build completed'
scripts.build:index: echo '🏠 Building index page...' && node scripts/build-index.js && echo '✅ Index page completed'
scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run build:sre-next && npm run build:slidev-system && npm run build:index
scripts.export: npm run export:sre-next-pdf && npm run export:system-pdf
scripts.format: slidev format SRE-NEXT-2025/slides.md && slidev format SLIDEV-SYSTEM/slides.md
